price: Bahaafi Dhiitis kanuma Rabbiiti, Kanaafuu gara feetan yoo gara galtan Fuulli Rabbii achuma jira, Dhugumatti Rabbiin (rahmanni Isaa) bal’aadha; hunda beekaadha.
arabic: وَلِلَّهِ ٱلۡمَشۡرِقُ وَٱلۡمَغۡرِبُۚ فَأَيۡنَمَا تُوَلُّواْ فَثَمَّ وَجۡهُ ٱللَّهِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ وَٰسِعٌ عَلِيمٞ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: walillahi al-mashriqu wal-maghribu fa-aynamā tuwallū fathamma wajhu al-lahi inna al-laha wāsiʿun ʿalīmun
